text: Frederick Michael George Hall (3 March 1985 â€“ 24 April 2022) was a Bermudian professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He made ten appearances for the Bermuda national football team between 2011 and 2015. On 24 April 2022, Hall was killed in a car crash in St. George's, Bermuda at the age of 37. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bermudian footballers Category:Road accident deaths Category:Toronto FC players
title: Freddy Hall
